text: Hanwha Qcells Technologies, Inc. 501 2nd St, Suite 500, San Francisco, CA, 94107 www.qcells.com/us August 19, 2024 Via Email Notice to Employee as to Change of Relationship Employee Name: Scott Otterson SSN: XXX – XX – 3861 This letter serves to inform the employee listed here of the change of relationship with the employer, Hanwha Qcells Technologies, Inc. Employment status has changed for the reason noted below: • Reduction in Force – Effective: August 20, 2024 Best regards, Hanwha Qcells Technologies, Inc.
